Presumptive SC for Asthma
The PACT Act provided for presumptive SC for, “asthma that was diagnosed after service of the covered Veteran.”  This means the presumption only applies when asthma is diagnosed after service.  Asthma is also a presumptive condition presumed to be associated with exposure to fine particulate matter per
38 CFR 3.320
.
The Department of Veterans Affairs has implemented the PACT Act presumption for asthma as shown in the table below for all decisions made.
If asthma was first diagnosed …
Then …
prior to, or
